risk.name: Risk Assessment
risk.desc: Internal risk reporting tool for an internship project: Delivered dynamic report forms, table/dashboard views, secure token-based auth, and precise category search/filter with time-based risk counts.

quiz.name: Quiz Application
quiz.desc: Web quiz platform with authentication and an admin flow to manage quizzes/questions. Implemented Redux for global state and secure user data handling after login.

meals.name: MealsToGo (React Native)
meals.desc: Mobile app to discover/order meals. Implemented in-app payments with Stripe, real-time location (Google Cloud + Firebase), and profile personalization with camera-based avatar capture.
